Name: Aetherstorm
Description: The [name]'s Raging Storm deals 2 divine damage to all foes inside when created, and its allies are immune to its effects. In addition, when any character starts its turn in the area, the [name] can apply one of following effects.

ListedItems.Name: Earth
ListedItems.Description: Create a pit under the character.

ListedItems.Name: Fire
ListedItems.Description: Character deals 2 piercing damage to all adjacent foes.

ListedItems.Name: Water
ListedItems.Description: End a status on the character.

Name: Crystal Perfection
Description: The [name] can use the average of its damage die (6) instead of rolling for damage.

Name: Cursed Cauldron
Description: Foes do not save against conditions at the end of their turn while in the aura of the cauldron.

Name: Living Deeps
Description: Instead of a 2x2 space, this [name] occupies an Arc 4 space that can be placed in any configuration. When it moves, move either end space of the Arc, then re-place the Arc in any valid configuration. It can make attacks or use abilities from any of its spaces.

Name: Primal Aether
Description: This character's abilities do not trigger interrupts or activate effects from its foes.

Name: Rune of Warding
Description: Aura 2. Foes that enter the aura take 2 piercing damage. They can only take this damage once round.

Name: Scouring Gaze
Description: The [name] shoots a beam of energy at any foe that ends their turn in the Dampen Time area, dealing 4 piercing damage to them. If they are blinded, foes take only 1 piercing damage instead.

Name: Sweet Torment
Description: The [name] has aura 2. Foes in the [name]'s aura or in the aura of their cauldron do not save against statuses at the end of their turn.

Name: Thinblood
Description: Size 1, takes 1 point in an encounter budget, and doesn't have the elite trait like other Jotunn.

Name: Titan Armament
Description: This [name] is armed with Titansteel weaponry. They can take 1 extra turn a round.

Name: Titanblood
Description: Increase size to 2 if not already 2. (This character takes up a 2 by 2 area of spaces)

Name: Titanfall
Description: When defeated, roll 1d6 and assign a compass direction (1-none, 2- N, 3-E, 4-S, 5-W, 6-GM choice). The Jotunn falls into a medium blast area placed adjacent to its space in that direction. Size 1 characters inside must save or take 6 damage, or 3 on a successful save. Move all characters out of the area into the closest available space and place the defeated Jotunn there. They count as a 2x2 height 1 object while defeated.

Name: Wild Regeneration
Description: At the end of any turn the [name] takes 10 or more damage to its hp, it gains 10 vigor, then summon a loose limbs summon in free space in range 2.

Summons.Name: Loose Limbs
Summons.SummonEffects: At the start of the [name]'s turn, may rush 1 space, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.
